job description:
Do you enjoy numbers and process? Are you a techy person? If you live in the RTP area, Ranstad's premier client is looking for an experienced analyst to provide visibility to date for manufacturing campaigns in RTP. This is an excellent opportunity for you to gain experience in the biopharma industry.

Responsibilities:
This person will be responsible for building and reconfiguration of Discoverant data hierarchies, support data management workflows in Discoverant and Statistica. In addition, data flow creation and design of Tableau dashboards.

Working hours: 8:00 AM - 5:00 PM

Skills:
Ability to code in visual basic, SQL, Python or Matlab.
Working knowledge of Discoverant, Statistica, DeltaV or Pi a plus.

Education:
Bachelors

Experience:
Experienced

Qualifications:
Working knowledge of Discoverant, Statistica, DeltaV or Pi a plus.

Apply on line. I will be scheduling phone screens very soon.
